plannings.title: Floor planning
plannings.subtitle: Free, available online or at an Ayatrio location
plannings.description: Book a Floor planning appointment and an Ayatrio Floor planning expert will help you design your dream floor. Bring measurements of your space and a drawing or picture of the area and we will tailor your plan to meet your needs.

plannings.title: Ayatrio for Business
plannings.subtitle: Free, available online or at an Ayatrio location
plannings.description: Book an appointment with an Ayatrio Business specialist who will help you plan furniture and storage solutions for your business. Whether you need help setting up a new office, creating a kitchenette in your breakroom, organizing your storage room or setting up a display area to showcase your products. Bring measurements of your space, and our specialists will help you create functional solutions for your business.

plannings.title: Cuetain and blinds planning
plannings.subtitle: Free, available online or at an Ayatrio location
plannings.description: Book an appointment with an Ayatrio Cuetain and blinds expert who will assist you in planning your dream Cuetain and blinds or closet solution. You provide measurements of your space, and we will help you design a functional storage solution that suits your needs.
plannings.button: Book a Cuetain and blinds planning appointment
links: Try online Cuetain and blinds planners

plannings.title: Room design planning
plannings.subtitle: Free, available online or at an Ayatrio location
plannings.description: Book an appointment with an Ayatrio Room design expert who will assist you in planning your Room design needs. You provide measurements of your space, and we will tailor your storage solution to display what you want and hide the rest.
plannings.button: Book a living/bed/kids/office room planning appointment

checkout.title: Click & Collect
checkout.description: Buy online, pick-up in-store and we will bring it to you.

checkout.title: TaskRabbit Assembly
checkout.description: Find flexible and affordable ways to get your to-dos done.

checkout.title: Delivery
checkout.description: Shop from home and get it delivered to your front door.

checkout.title: Financing options
checkout.description: Finance your dream home with our credit cards.
